comments.body: Good idea

The wasp enchantment might be a little far fetched, maybe it could be added into jungle temple loot and will poison anything that attacks you, while also making you temporarily weaker (from using the poison). The enchantment being in the jungle temple could also be a little bit of lore, it's a special enchantment jungle villagers used to ward of the wasps.

I do love the wasps themselves though, would make the jungle more exciting.
They should also be hostile against bees

Wasps can spawn in any warm biome. If they sting you then you lose one heart.
Bertie (6)

Suggested by a fun buddy. 

How did the blind get here? What was their purpose? All of this was uncovered by a minor called Steve. On his daily routine for diamonds, he uncovered a small dark cavern. Slowly creeping in he found a mysterious monster's spawner. On that monster's spawner, was a torch. Intrigued Steve remove that torch. Out spawned a terrible Zombie in the dark room. Steve began to run as the zombie Chased him. More and more the cave began filling up with the blind. Regular zombies began to flee the caves As the blind continue to chase Steve. Then Steve have been cornered by the blind Steve motionless and still, paralyzed in fear crouched down to floor. As the blind began to walk away. Steve left confused stood up and returned home. That night Steve

began to study the blind, and came out with countermeasures. One move silently. Two Don't use your tools in their presence unless if you're prepared for combat. Three keep a sharp eye out. As for its purpose it's like any other zombie searching for something to be its next main entrée.

                                                                                              Suggested as a way to excite readers.
Perfection
should make it not notice if you swing but only if you break a block or hit something and make you be able to jump too
Anything that makes a loud noise will trigger the mob. Jumping, hitting, breaking blocks, placing heavy blocks, swinging of tools, fire, etc..

Hey, just a question for the community.
Should I re-design this mob for the deep dark?
I'll even work on making a visual aid, or a rough sketch.

Sure that's great, but what if instead of a zombie, It's a old man that spawns in a new structure THE CABIN. blind but he will talk....ish he listens for movement. And when he locks on to you he chases you until you die. He gives the effect blindness when your within 10 blocks. But when you kill him he drops a cloak which when equipped your invisible and make no sound, but gives slowness. The cloak could have a 20% chance of summoning a shadow of the player that follows you but doesn't do damage. Thoughts??????
It'd be really interesting to see the different ways a player could fight it. It could break obsidian if a player tries the good ol place some water down.
I'm not closing this but I'm also saying this thread may be of interest: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360044568571--Nether-biome-Lava-Ocean
Why not just make a real whale first??? There's already ghasts.

Minecraft currently has no extinct animals (dinosaurs were rejected, but not other extinct animals), so I think the moas, elephant birds, Caribbean ground sloths, hippos, and giant tortoises should be added to Minecraft.
I think also the Dodo bird could be a good extinct mob to add
I know that the Dodo bird lived on a bird paradise before early settlers came
I think that this is something I would enjoy to see in the game
Nice!
I don't care how "useless" this feature is, it technically does something and it's neat.
I agree

Where would it spawn though? Surely not in all the biomes.

This is a great idea. Wyverns are smaller than dragons and I think that this idea could be better than having pet dragons
they should spawn in new forests called deathwood forests as mothers who guard wyvern eggs
I think they should drop wyvern venom you use on weapons to make them do +1 damage and inflicts poison 1 for 10 seconds on there next hit but only last 1 hit and wyverns attack with tail stinger

What if the Wyvern became a golem you could summon, like a snowman. They could use the copper they put into the game, building like a golem, but horizonal. And instead of a pumpkin head, lightning has to strike it for it to be activated.

Also hope it would be tamable and rideable.
There should be a new portal to a different world were the wyverns are.
Also, I think they should drop Wyvern scales which you could use to craft tools, blocks, slabs, stairs, armors, etc.
I think that Minecraft should add a new boss because the old ones are kinda getting boring it could be called the Skulk Wyvern and should be really hard and annoying
Mostly focused on mob here, so putting in the Mobs category.
Why should the Nether have two bosses?  The Wither is already the Nether's boss, after all.
Add imp to demon shaft
You know this is a kids game I don’t think it should have religion in it

Dude I love the creativity!

The only problem is.... When you have a boss like that and can do all that. How are you supposed to beat it? Well with a sword not really. With a bow under water we’ll that’s useless. So how would you be able to beat it? I mean a trident would work. Though you would go through so many tridents that it would not be fun. So I came up with a vary similar idea but not as hard!

Well you know those under water temples? Well have one huge one and have guardians surrounding the thing. Though in the middle there’s a portal. That portal will lead you to like the end only it’s the water kingdom or something. Then have it so you are on like a platform. Then have this long snake like Leviathan that bolts into you and you have to jump out of the way. It has 500 health even. Then after 4 bolts it uses a tornado like thing and you have to run from that. Then it shoots like a Crystal thing and you have to deflect it like a Gast fire ball and then it floats down and you have 4 seconds to Attack it with your weapons and then it repeats the attacks until it gets down to 200 health then it follows you and try’s to suck you in witch then you have to use tnt and light the tnt and it sucks it in and you have to do that 5 times to make it so you can attack it!

That’s my idea! Hope you like it!

There should be a Minecraft leviathan which is accurate to legends and myths, and it will rarely spawn. This will be a massive monstrous creature with a single scale equalling around the size of one shield, they can breathe fire, and they have 2-7 heads. This would be a type of creature you can fight, but you cannot defeat it. Players would have to run from it in terror and wait for it to despawn. If they survive, they get the effects Hero of the Village and Glowing.

I have an idea just like this- but you must defeat the Ender dragon for it to be available to the player. It spawns in another dimension, full of water. There is no air, so you must get a totem of water breathing. They can be found in the End. Tridents are the secret weapon against it.

The Deep- the home of Leviathan (Part of "INFINITE UPDATE" Idea) – Minecraft Feedback

This is not clearly written. Are you asking for the shulker bullets to be able to give its targets any wanted effect upon a hit? If yes, then are you sure that it isn't possible already?

If your answers are yes to both questions then I will vote, because this sounds useful to mapmakers.
Yes I am saying to choose potion effects for shulkers; and there is a way to do it, with 100 commands
Okay because the way you wrote it in your post, it sounds like you want the shulker to have a status effect applied to itself. You should fix that in your post :)
fixed!
I think this would be cool if we could do it for all mobs.
I think it would be great to have a threat to minshafts it is a great idea

An enemy in the shafts is a good idea but, passing through walls is a bit much.

currently there is only cave spiders and the occasional zombie skeleton creeper 

another mob would be nice, also, pls add more magic into its drop

Mineshafts already have poison spider spawners as a serious threat, I'm not sure they need another.

Unless you mean that they would spawn in player-made mineshafts?  I'm not sure how the spawning mechanics would work on that.
Note: I know there's cave spiders but they only spawn via spawners in certain areas in mineshafts. Plz listen to my note.

A few more ideas on this topic - perhaps instead of the Potion of Wall Passing, it could be called Potion of Intangibility (a much cooler name).

Also, the mob could be neutral and invisible in light levels of 7 or below, but upon a player lighting the area up, it could appear and attack. This could definitely help an outdated structure like a Mineshaft become more of a challenge though.
This seems like a great idea since we need more aquatic life!

Akin to real life koi and koi history, maybe most naturally spawning koi are rather featureless save for one characteristic like a spot or color, so the players have to breed all these variants to get the marvelous designs patterns koi are renowned for. It could be an in-depth system players have to map out to figure out how to get specific patterns. It would be like how real koi breeders go about it. But in the off chance someone doesn't get this system, more complex patterns could on rare chance also spawn in the wild so players can just take those home.

Also like real koi, in the game they shouldn't flee from players like salmon, cod, and tropical fish do.
Cool idea, but what would crack eyes of ender be used for?
Cool! It seems a bit more annoying though... Still I voted cuz' I liked it!
This is good idea
You can stand on a boat but it does not work great, but what if you could sit on it?
No riding it!!!!!!!!!!!!!
It’s a better idea than making it rideable. We already have enough rideable animals without throwing the sniffer into the mix.
I totally agree, and it looks good because these dinosaurs are big: https://imgur.com/a/9IlGkhj
That's exactly what I was thinking. Please Microsoft add this in.

Please vote, we really need this mob in Minecraft. It would go well with the Caves and Cliffs for the new mountains.
ya me to
i want

I think your idea is great and I support it, I'd like mojang to take it into account. The loot thing, although cobblestone, roads and land, it would be logical and with more sense, the players need something that is new and more a new mob that is strong should release something that is not yet in the game, For example, my idea to complement yours is to give a 4-leaf clover that allows us to create the effect of a potion of luck. An effect that cannot be obtained in survivability and that would give the game an air if it were added in that way. too. I think the percentage of that item is very low so you get excited when you get one and not break the game if that was exaggerated. Thank you
Yes, and it should probably be stronger while a pickaxe does more damage, and has a rare chance to drop any ore. Cool, I voted!

Maybe instead of dropping cobble stone it should drop a new item. Like pebbles. It’s ammo for a new weapon...

A slingshot. Like a bow, a slingshot shoots something that can cause a lot of damage. But instead of arrows it uses pebbles. Using sticks in a y shape and string at the top, you have now got yourself a slingshot. But your ammo will be hard to find as pebbles can’t be crafted and have to be either stollen from chests or drooped from the stone golem. And maybe you can make like an iron golem just with stone I’m up for it! We need new bosses the wither and Ender dragon are getting kind of boring

How about when they attack you they steal experience levels. Nothing currently does that, and it would add a small hurdle to enchanting.
